content:
In the Kherson region, border guards with the help of FPV-aroma destroyed the infantry fighting machine of the invaders.

About thisinformsState Border Service of Ukraine.

"Pilots of" battles "of the State Border Guard Service with the help of FPV-pins regularly strike the occupiers in the south of Ukraine,"-the message reads.

As it is noted, the Russian military tried to mask the infantry fighting car, but the border guards to detect and destroy it.

We will remind, the Armed Forces in the SouthDestroyedboat and 6 invaders.

As reportedArmyinform, in the east, the invaders lost 10 tanks per day, 5 remedies and warehouses with ammunition.
title: Ukrainian "battle birds" left the Russians without BMP again
description: The State Border Service of Ukraine informs about it. «Pilots 'Birds'……
author: Army Inform
